snippet: After decades of Vatican indifference and evasion, the new church leader will seek reform proposals from a global commission.
abstract: Editorial praises Pope Francis for creating commission to study rape and intimidation of schoolchildren by priests and to recommend measures for effective reform; holds long-overdue move is further evidence of Francis's refreshing resolve to shake up Vatican intransigence.
lead_paragraph: After decades of Vatican indifference and evasion, the new church leader will seek reform proposals from a global commission.

headline.main: A Pope’s New Path on Child Abuse
headline.print_headline: A Pope’s New Path on Child Abuse
